name: Trapped Summoner
description: Trapped Summoner - a fascinating indie game in retro style with elements of RPG.You have to get out of the underground of Taigren`s Castle, bypassing all clever traps and fighting with various monsters that live there.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP Service Pack 1 Processor: Intel® Celeron® G1840, AMD® A4-4000 or Better Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: Built-in graphics card DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 250 MB available space Sound Card: Integrated Direct-X Compatible
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7,8,10 Processor: Intel® Core® - i3, AMD® A6-6400k or Better Memory: 1024 MB RAM Graphics: Built-in graphics card or Intel HD Graphics 3000 or Better DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 250 MB available space Sound Card: Integrated Direct-X Compatible
